timelines.desc: I worked as Full stack developer. Build the CMS for Galaxy Academy System. Galaxy Academy is  management system for E-Learning platform for child the age of 10. I developed the system by used VueJs as UI and used Nodejs for developed API. I used Graphql for provide request from The system and UI for management the content

I maintain and developed API that comunicate NDID for EKYC flow to open bank account without going to the branch. NDID is Blockchain system for store customer data from many reliable provider including commercial banks in Thailand and government agencies
I developed frontend and api for real estate appraisal system. used React for build frontend and nodejs for build the api. By obtaining real estate data that collect by Krungsri bank
I developed and maintain the Project part of SCG Home called My Home. The Project used nextjs for frontend and nodejs used koa for provide api.
